column4: can someone tell me all the web browsers for Ubuntu? firefox, Opera, and what others?
whats a ubuntu web browser that is in repos?
thank you, i been spending all morning trying to remember that lol :0  hugs to ya

its really strange,  firefox and opera etc doesnt load my banks login page properly, it flashes on and off.  But epiphany works perfect accesing it.  And I reinstalled ubuntu and I forgiten the name until you reminded me :)
yeah. epiphany is my backup browser. when firefox starts to piss me off or when i need something quick and want to use less resources, i turn to epiphany
i rang my bank and told them that firefox and opera makes my login page flash on and off. they are confused why.  But epiphany-browser works perfect, so im lucky I can use that :)
that's kind of weird, especially since Epiphany uses the same rendering engine as Firefox to display pages
yeah i know, the tech at my bank cant work out why.  but firefox and opera work great on other pages, its just that one.  but epiphany-browser works great, and it doesnt flash on and off.  no idea :P
so thank goodness for epiphany-browser :)  otherwise I could not access my banks webpage
how do I refresh my menu so epiphany-browser shows up in menu?
it should appear right away. if not, try System->Preferences->Main Menu
it wasnt ticked in System->Preferences->Main Menu.  I just ticked it
thanks, after I ticked it in System->Preferences->Main Menu, its now showing :)
